name: My First Game (R4zorcl4w77)
description: This is my first game (and game jam) so I hope you enjoy the game to the best of your ability. It's really just a time waster. So yeah. I kinda lost motivation for the game since I just randomly joined a jam without even watching the announcement video, so I had no idea and plus, this is my first game so. There's my excuse... :D (I'm going to work on another project now.)
